title: YOTEL New York Times Square
desc: This smoke-free hotel features a 24-hour fitness center, a bar/lounge, and a coffee shop/cafe. WiFi in public areas is free. Additionally, a microwave in a common area, a business center, and conference space are onsite. All 300 rooms feature modern comforts like LED TVs with cable channels, along with free WiFi. Egyptian cotton sheets, coffee makers, and free local calls are among the other amenities available to guests. Change of towels is available on request.
